translating out your chosen passage into morse code to help keep it legible- this includes spacing between letters and words the space between parts of the same letter is one single_crochet single_crochet 1 single_crochet the space between letters is three single crochets 3 single_crochet the space between words is seven single crochets 7 single_crochet let s try it out example one
